Borrowed Protection.name: Borrowed Protection
Borrowed Protection.flavor: Your elemental soul allows you to tap into your enemy’s resistance to protect another.
Borrowed Protection.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target has any resistances, you grant the same resistances to yourself or an ally within 10 squares of you until the end of your next turn.

Shared Manifestation.name: Shared Manifestation
Shared Manifestation.flavor: You call upon the elemental power within you, imbuing a temporary fragment of it into a nearby ally.
Shared Manifestation.effect: The target shares one elemental manifestation you are currently manifesting. The target can use the associated racial power of that manifestation, even if you have used that power during this encounter. If the target already has an elemental manifestation, the new manifestation replaces the previous one for the duration of this effect. The effect lasts until the end of the encounter or until you take a minor action to end it.

Elemental-Heart Strike.name: Elemental-Heart Strike
Elemental-Heart Strike.flavor: You channel your energy resistance into a potent melee attack, briefly leaving yourself unprotected.
keywords: Martial, Weapon ; Cold, Fire or Lightning
Elemental-Heart Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. You lose your resistance to cold, fire, or lightning until the start of your next turn—whichever resistance is highest—and the attack deals extra damage equal to that resistance and of the damage type opposed by the resistance.
Elemental-Heart Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and no extra damage.
